src:
Budućnost pregazila Megu
03 Nov 2019, 13:51 by Milos
Mega Bemax – Budućnost 57:94(21:25, 4:21, 18:28,14:20)
Košarkaši Budućnosti deklasirali su Megu Bemax na gostovanju u utakmici petog kola ABA lige.
Susret je rešen u drugoj četvrtini, u kojoj su gosti iz Podgorice primili samo četiri poena, a Budućnost tu nije stala već je do kraja mlela svog današnjeg rivala.
Budućnost je dominirala u skoro svim segmentima igre, asistencije, ukradene lopte, a posebno u procentu šuta (55.7 naspram 31.9%), pa prednost Mege u skokovima nije donela praktično ništa.
Najzapaženiji kod gostiju, koji sada imaju skor 4:1, bili su Suad Šehović sa 12 poena, Skot Banfort sa 11, Nikola Ivanović, koji je uz 10 poena imao i osam asistencija i Džastin Kobs sa devet poena i sedam dodavanja.
Kod Mege, koja je upisala četvrti poraz, bolji od ostalih bili su Marko Simović sa 15 koševa i Jurij Macura, koji je dodao 13.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
The future overtook Mega
03 Nov 2019, 12:51 by Milos
Mega Bemax - Future 57:94 (21:25, 4:21, 18: 28,14: 20)
Future Basketball players have declared Mega Bemax away in the fifth round of the ABA League.
The meeting was solved in the second quarter, in which the guests from Podgorica received only four points, and Budućnost did not stop there, but until the end it grinded its present rival.
The future dominated in almost all segments of play, assists, steals, and especially in shot percentage (55.7 vs. 31.9%), so Mega's advantage in rebounds yielded virtually nothing.
Most notable for the guests, now scoring 4-1, were Suad Sehovic with 12 points, Scott Banfort with 11, Nikola Ivanovic, who also had eight assists with 10 points and Justin Kobs with nine points and seven touchdowns.
Mega, who recorded her fourth loss, was better than the others with Marko Simovic with 15 points and Yuri Macura, who added 13.
